tweet:
We need to be bold on infrastructure & today’s White House meeting was a step in the right direction.

$2 trillion will have the kind of impact our communities need from roads to water infrastructure - we've got to keep pushing for a bipartisan deal here. https://www.nytimes.com/2019/04/30/us/politics/trump-infrastructure-plan.html …

This country has a choice - we can lead the transition to a low-carbon economy or watch as our workers are left behind.

This should be a no-brainer. It's time to #ActOnClimate. pic.twitter.com/Q22teAJZiz

As the father of 2 young women, ratifying the Equal Rights Amendment is personal to me - its absence is a stain on our Constitution. 

It's time to fix that & I won’t give up until we do. All women should be equal under the law #ERAHearing #ERANow https://twitter.com/HouseJudiciary/status/1123211658594258944 …

2018 was the 3rd highest year on record AND the year we witnessed the deadliest anti-Semitic attack in US history - the Tree of Life Synagogue shooting. In NY alone, anti-Semitic assaults increased by 55%. We've got to put an end to this violence & hate. https://nynj.adl.org/news/nyaudit2018/ …

Cancer, diabetes, heart disease - across the board, communities of color suffer increased #HealthDisparities.

This #MinorityHealthMonth, I am standing with the @OfficialCBC, @HispanicCaucus & @CAPAC to fight systemic health injustices in our communities. RT if you're with me.

74 yrs ago today, US troops liberated the Dachau concentration camp.

It’s crazy that in 2019 we are still fighting anti-Semitism but the hatred & violence we witnessed this weekend at the synagogue shooting makes it all too clear that we must do more to stand #unitedagainsthate. https://twitter.com/NPR/status/1122584769508925446 …

This crisis has been ignored for too long - we need to do right by our veterans & work at all levels of government to find real solutions to this national tragedy. That starts now. https://twitter.com/LeoShane/status/1122942065854304256 …
A woman's medical decisions should be made between her and her doctor - NOT by politicians spreading fake news. Shameful. https://twitter.com/PolitiFact/status/1111427394684936194 …

Every day, 20 veterans take their own lives. Our nation’s servicemembers have already sacrificed so much to keep us all safe, now, it’s our turn to #bethere for them.

Praying for the victims, survivors & first responders of Chabad of Poway.

The opioid epidemic doesn't discriminate - it's affecting kids, parents, teachers, Drs & ppl from all corners of our community

141 million Americans live w/ unhealthy levels of air pollution - putting them at risk of early death, lung cancer, asthma, cardiovascular damage & reproductive harm. & it's only getting worse.

We need a plan to reverse this trend - #HR9 is a good start. https://www.theguardian.com/environment/2019/apr/23/americans-unsafe-air-quality-report …
